website_summaries.verdict: The classic Puma Basket silhouette is given some modern touch and a little bit of height by introducing the Basket Platform. It showcases the artistic combination of quality, performance, and versatility in style.It carries the standard features like other Puma Basket sneakers yet also offers some enhanced attributes, most notably, its new added height with its platform sole. The low-top silhouette displays a rather stylish appeal that fashionably serves the wearer.
pros: The majority of the critics are impressed by the superb comfort that the Puma Basket Platform provides
The sneaker looks very stylish, according to most of the buyers
A good number of users are glad about the ability of the shoe to go well with various outfits
Some of the buyers have appreciated the few inches added to their height when wearing the shoe
A variety of colorways is available for the shoe, offering the buyers more options to choose from
The Basket Platform is offered at an affordable price point
cons: A few users have noted that the shoe weighs a little heavy
The Puma Basket Platform runs wide, as what a few consumers pointed out

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Puma!
customer_reviews.text: I always love Puma. I know that I have to order a 1/2 size smaller. I have narrow feet. They fit me very well. I get compliments when I wear them. They were delivered very fast. I always like getting my orders on time. I will order again. Thank you, AAAAA+++++
customer_reviews.author: eyesovgold

customer_reviews.title: Very cute shoes, but the tongue of the shoe is sharp and rubs your leg.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these shoves. Unfortunately, they ran too narrow for me. Also, the tongue of this shoe is very stiff and rubs on your leg! I was a bit put off, that these were obviously returned shoes and had been worn long enough to make creases in the shoes. The shoes were just thrown into the box with crumpled up tissue paper. Hopefully, you won’t have that experience.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not even sure if these are real leather. They are cute but definitely cheap quality. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfortable. Every time I wear them I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Too big and heel keeps slipping off. Can't return because I have worn them all day hoping to make them work 😭😭. Also they aren't as arch support as I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Watts

customer_reviews.title: Heel fits loosely
customer_reviews.text: *almost* perfect but a bit heavy and kept sliding iff my heel no matter what sock i tried with it. Felt like blisters would be an issue. Arch support is moderate but noticeable and good cushioning. Otherwise fits as expected width wise. Just the issue with the heel. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Garza

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large
customer_reviews.text: I really wish this fit me but it runs big. I had to return it other than the size it's really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dun

customer_reviews.title: nice looking gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 11 was afraid it wouldn't be wide enough but it was. It is a little to big but they didn't sell 101/2.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Morrison

customer_reviews.title: These run big
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute but run quite large. I wish I had ordered a size down~
customer_reviews.author: Mare  Secrist

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes it is pretty, looks good on my feet and fits great. I took a size below and it fits i wear size 8 and i took a 7.5 and the 7.5 fits great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No arch support, but they are fashionable
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but no support, feet after 13hours of wear time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronieek

customer_reviews.title: Boxy and large on your feet if you like that trend
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t exactly as I expected them to be, but I’m still fine with the shoes. It’ll take a while to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Bomb.com Pumas
customer_reviews.text: I like these puma sneakers. Got a half size too big but good wiggle room for my toes
customer_reviews.author: Ju

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to break in!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!! They’re incredibly comfortable and also supportive. I have wide feet & usually have to break them in width wise but these were comfy from the start!
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! Goes with so many outfits and they came in the box brand new with a second pair of laces. Happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Naudica

customer_reviews.title: Second pair I’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: I have these in black suede, love them. Although not the greatest fit in the world they look really cool and go with heaps
customer_reviews.author: libby

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: They’re not as pretty as they seem.. and they’re very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mariella Aldave

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are now a staple in my closet I love them so much
customer_reviews.author: LaTyra

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes but NOT TRUE TO SIZE at all, they run way too big, I recommend order a size under
customer_reviews.author: DaniR

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Basket Platform Sneaker, White-Rose Gold, 7 UK
product_meta.description: The basket platform is inspired by the grunge fashion movement of the 1990s. With its high outsole combined with a suede upper, the basket platform is a collaboration between two iconic movements in the sneaker and footwear industry.
